title: Empowering Developers to Harness Sensor Data for Advanced Analytics
author: Nick Hehr
description: The journey from collecting raw sensor data to actionable analysis can be riddled with stumbling blocks, as the realities of hardware components and environmental conditions come into play.
cntitle: 赋能开发者利用传感器数据进行高级分析
cndescription: 从收集原始传感器数据到可操作的分析，这个过程可能会遇到很多障碍，因为硬件组件和环境条件的现实情况会发挥作用。
